original_text: And having sought out the disciples, we stayed there for seven days. And through the Spirit they were telling Paul not to go on to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 제자들을 찾아 거기서 이레를 머물더니 그 제자들이 성령의 감동으로 바울더러 예루살렘에 들어가지 말라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And having sought out the disciples,
we stayed there for seven days.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 거기서 칠 일 동안 머물렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: not to go on to Jerusalem.
